results.title: Zelda II: The Adventure of Link
results.brief_description: The land of Hyrule is in chaos. As Link, you’ll be sent on a treacherous journey to return six precious Crystals to their origins in six stone statues. Only by defeating the guardians of the six palaces will you gain passage to the seventh palace, take on the ultimate challenge that awaits you, and wake the Princess Zelda from her sleeping spell. On your way, helpful villagers you encounter will offer clues and secret messages invaluable in your quest. As you guide Link through the levels of Hyrule, close-ups and overviews will enhance your video vision. Are you up to the challenge?

constellations_other.name: City of animals (Hollow Knight - Production Design)
constellations_other.description: The adorable bugs that occupy Hallownest in the game Hollow Knight aren't the first anthropomorphised critters in film.

results.title: Zeca: portrait of a Vaqueiro
results.creator_credit: George Sluizer, Sluizer Films and Phoenix Films
results.brief_description: Traces the professional, social, and family life of Zeca, a cowherd from Brazil. Suitable for secondary levels.

results.title: Zebras
results.creator_credit: GK Film, Stockholm and Choice Films
results.brief_description: An animated film of uncommon warmth and humor by the Swedish artist Johan Hagelback. Two zebras happily discover each other, and then, unhappily, lose one of their stripes. They investigate every visible form and shape until they recover the vital black stripe of their own.

results.title: Zebra
results.creator_credit: Peter Chermayeff and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
results.brief_description: Like the horse it resembles, the zebra travels in large herds following the edible grasses and available water. Chief among the zebra’s physical traits are the striped markings that help camouflage it in the uneven light of dawn and dusk when it is most often hunted by lions. Shows scenes of zebras playing and socialising. Filmed in the national parks of Tanzania, East Africa.

results.title: Zea (K)
results.creator_credit: Jean-Jacques Leduc, Andre Leduc, Robert Forget and ONF | NFB
results.brief_description: A superb visual trick that will mystify its audience, this animated film transforms the commonplace into magic. The film presented a serious technical challenge because the subject was both elusive and explosive. A film to watch, enjoy and laugh about. (Awards: Cannes; Chicago; Elmhurst; Columbus; Paris; Genie, Toronto.) Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.

results.title: Zazie Dans le Metro = Zazie in the Subway
results.brief_description:
Precocious, foul-mouthed pre-teen Zazie spends three days with her female impersonator uncle Gabriel in Paris with the sole intention of riding the Metro. But everything conspires against her.

Credits: Director, Louis Malle ; writers, Louis Malle, Jean-Paul Rappeneau ; photography, Henri Raichi ; music, Fiorenzo Carpi ; art direction, Bernard Evein.
Cast: Philippe Noiret, Catherine Demongeot, Hubert Deschamps, Jacques Dufilho, Annie Fratellini.

results.title: Zardip's search for healthy wellness. Part 2
results.brief_description: This series uses live action, animation and song to promote an awareness and understanding of how the body works and what it needs to stay healthy. In ten episodes, Zardip, a friendly alien, learns about the human body, and people and places which care for our health. This program looks at the dentis and doctor, hospitals and operations, ears and eyes, safety and environmental health and feelings. Finally, Zardip is able to attain the healthy wellness he had been seeking.

results.title: Zardip's search for healthy wellness. Part 1
results.brief_description: This series uses live action, animation and song to promote an awareness and understanding of how the body works and what it needs to stay healthy. In ten episodes, Zardip, a friendly alien, learns about the human body, diet and nutrition, growth, the value of exercise and sleep, germs and how to take care of the teeth.
